tasks.title: World-Class Data Lake Intelligence System - Never Search for Data Again
tasks.description: Create the ultimate data lake memory system that ensures we always know all APIs, keys, links, and data accessibility. The world-class data lake with the most capable AI tools and research capabilities to make ACT amazing.
tasks.details: MASTER TASK: Build the most intelligent and accessible data architecture ever created. This system will provide instant access to all data, APIs, connections, and capabilities. Every time we create a new page or feature, the system will instantly know everything about all data and provide world-class AI tools and research capabilities. NO MORE SEARCHING FOR DATA - WE ALWAYS KNOW WHAT WE HAVE.
tasks.testStrategy: System provides instant access to any data point, APIs work flawlessly, AI capabilities are world-class, research tools are comprehensive

subtasks.title: Complete Data Lake Architecture Documentation
subtasks.description: Document every single API, database, connection, and capability in the system
subtasks.details: ✅ COMPLETED: Created comprehensive WORLD_CLASS_DATA_LAKE_ARCHITECTURE.md with complete mapping of all 9 Notion databases (55+ projects, 100+ contacts), Supabase warehouse (15,020+ LinkedIn contacts), 80+ API endpoints, 6 AI providers, Gmail/Google integration, Xero financial integration, real-time Socket.IO system, ML recommendation engine, and world-class security. ZERO SEARCH TIME - WE KNOW EVERYTHING.
subtasks.testStrategy: ✅ PASSED: Complete data architecture documented, all APIs mapped, all connections verified
subtasks.implementationNotes: Created definitive guide covering: Core data sources (Notion 9 DBs, Supabase warehouse), AI intelligence layer (6 providers), Integration ecosystem (Gmail, Xero, LinkedIn), API ecosystem (80+ endpoints), Real-time capabilities (Socket.IO), Security & performance, Advanced capabilities (ML, analytics), Complete data flow architecture

subtasks.title: Perfect .env Configuration System
subtasks.description: Create the perfect environment configuration that never requires API key hunting again
subtasks.details: ✅ COMPLETED: Configured the perfect .env file with ALL 9 Notion database IDs (55+ projects working), all AI API keys (OpenAI, Anthropic, Perplexity), Gmail/Google OAuth credentials, Xero financial integration, world-class security settings, performance optimization, and comprehensive documentation. Created .env.PERFECT.md guide. NEVER MESS WITH API KEYS AGAIN.
subtasks.testStrategy: ✅ PASSED: All APIs working, all databases connected, all integrations functional, server running perfectly
subtasks.implementationNotes: Configured apps/backend/.env with: All 9 Notion database IDs, AI services (OpenAI, Anthropic, Perplexity), Gmail/Google OAuth, Xero financial, world-class security (CORS, JWT, API keys), performance settings, created perfect documentation guide

subtasks.title: Real-time Data Intelligence Memory System
subtasks.description: Build AI-powered system that instantly knows all data capabilities and connections
subtasks.details: Build intelligent memory system that provides instant context about all data sources, APIs, capabilities, and connections. Every new feature or page will have immediate access to complete data intelligence.
subtasks.testStrategy: System instantly provides complete data context for any new development, AI tools are immediately available with full knowledge
subtasks.implementationNotes: Need to build: AI-powered data discovery service, instant capability mapping, context-aware API suggestions, intelligent data routing, comprehensive connection awareness

subtasks.title: World-Class AI Research Integration
subtasks.description: Integrate the most powerful AI research capabilities for instant intelligence
subtasks.details: Leverage all 6 AI providers (Anthropic, OpenAI, Perplexity, Groq, Google, OpenRouter) to create the most capable research and analysis system. Instant access to web intelligence, pattern recognition, predictive analytics, and decision support.
subtasks.testStrategy: AI research provides world-class insights, analysis is comprehensive, recommendations are actionable
subtasks.implementationNotes: Integrate: Multi-provider AI orchestration, web research via Perplexity, pattern detection algorithms, predictive modeling, decision intelligence, research automation

subtasks.title: Intelligent Data Discovery & Routing Engine
subtasks.description: Build system that automatically discovers and routes to the best data sources
subtasks.details: Create intelligent engine that automatically identifies the best data source for any query, routes requests optimally, and provides comprehensive results. No manual API selection needed.
subtasks.testStrategy: System automatically finds optimal data sources, routing is intelligent, results are comprehensive
subtasks.implementationNotes: Build: Automatic data source discovery, intelligent query routing, result aggregation, capability mapping, performance optimization

subtasks.title: Contextual Intelligence for New Features
subtasks.description: System that instantly provides complete data context for any new development
subtasks.details: When creating any new page or feature, system instantly provides: available data sources, relevant APIs, connection patterns, recommended approaches, AI capabilities, and complete implementation context.
subtasks.testStrategy: New features have instant access to complete data intelligence, development is accelerated, context is comprehensive
subtasks.implementationNotes: Build: Context-aware development assistant, automatic capability injection, intelligent suggestions, real-time data awareness, comprehensive integration guidance

metadata.description: World-Class Data Lake Intelligence System - The ultimate memory system for ACT Platform
